name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: Viola Davis is calling for a boycott of biased media outlets.

The EGOT-winning actress and producer took to social media on how the New York Post recently depicted Kenosha shooter Kyle Rittenhouse vs. their coverage of slain teenager Trayvon Martin.
https://t.co/sZQig10CX2

name: NYDailyNews
text:
An East Village bar owner who spoke out against a state requirement that food be served with drinks during the COVID-19 pandemic — then got shut down for flouting the rule — is suing Gov. Cuomo.

https://t.co/Ngul4habxT

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The families of the victims of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 want reparations for the injustice suffered which has been compounded by a Russian “disinformation” campaign.

https://t.co/WOh7d2U47A

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Former Knick Eddy Curry is being sued for disclosing a confidential settlement deal with his limo driver. 

https://t.co/Mf2VkyhfrL

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Most New Yorkers are unaware that under federal, state and city laws, they're entitled to paid time off if they or their child is forced to quarantine due to coronavirus, a new study shows. 

https://t.co/1VecvvKRVo

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Liberty University launched an investigation into its former president Jerry Falwell Jr. in the wake of his resignation amid sexual misconduct allegations.

https://t.co/KNWOEInmVq

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: The NYPD is not engaged in a work slowdown, Mayor de Blasio and Police Commissioner Dermot Shea again insisted.

Shea acknowledged that “some of the numbers ... are indisputable — the arrest levels are down, the response times are up."
https://t.co/ePkQtla406

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Jim Gaffigan got political after Trump’s RNC speech last week because he felt he had no other choice. 

He knows threats against his life and livelihood would be part of the deal.

He wrote a FB post: “What I’ve Learned Since I Lost My Mind.” @snydenydn
https://t.co/LRXptrJiq4

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: A hunter was killed in Oregon after he was gored by an elk he had shot.
https://t.co/0xklIepNas

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Edward (Swain) James, a beloved caretaker at a Brooklyn church, was shot dead at his house of worship. 

Cops believe the shooter chased him into the church.

The church’s deacon and congregants referred to him as a mainstay, and an icon in the community.

https://t.co/7C0gGILaNr

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: After much buzz, the cast of “The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air” will officially reunite for an unscripted special streaming via HBO Max.

https://t.co/utD6xVSeBi
